question: Which vendors are providing machine learning solutions to companies that have recently expanded their hiring in the tech department?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have recently expanded their hiring in the tech department. [CompanyHiringDetail]
Gather information on vendors providing machine learning solutions to these companies. [CompanyVendorProductDetail]
Match the identified companies with their respective machine learning vendors. [CompanyHiringDetail, CompanyVendorProductDetail]
